Columns.Name: 特別改良判定保証単価フラグ

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT 
    `main`.`group_id` AS `グループID`,
    `main`.`order_type_id` AS `申込タイプID`,
    `main`.`product_id` AS `商品ID`,
    `main`.`product_order_type` AS `申込区分`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`original_product_name` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`original_product_name` 
        ELSE `main`.`product_name` 
    END AS `商品名`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`original_special_note` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`original_special_note` 
        ELSE `main`.`special_note` 
    END AS `商品注釈`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_price` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`special_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`standard_price` 
    END AS `販売単価`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_price` IS NOT NULL THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS `特別販売単価フラグ`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_survey_price` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`special_survey_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`survey_price` 
    END AS `調査単価`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_survey_price` IS NOT NULL THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS `特別調査単価フラグ`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`special_gurantee_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`gurantee_price` 
    END AS `保証単価`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS `特別保証単価フラグ`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`impjudge_gurantee_price` 
    END AS `改良判定保証単価`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_impjudge_gurantee_price` IS NOT NULL THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS `特別改良判定保証単価フラグ`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_base_price` IS NOT NULL THEN `sub`.`special_base_price` 
        ELSE `main`.`base_price` 
    END AS `基礎単価`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `sub`.`special_base_price` IS NOT NULL THEN 1 
        ELSE 0 
    END AS `特別基礎単価フラグ`,
    `main`.`standard_price` AS `標準単価`,
    `main`.`survey_price` AS `標準調査単価`,
    `main`.`gurantee_price` AS `標準保証単価`,
    `main`.`base_price` AS `標準基礎単価`,
    `main`.`sort_no` AS `並び順`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `main`.`active_flg` = 0 THEN 0 
        WHEN `sub`.`active_flg` = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE 1 
    END AS `有効フラグ`
FROM 
    (
        SELECT 
            `main`.`group_id` AS `group_id`,
            `main`.`order_type_id` AS `order_type_id`,
            `suba`.`product_id` AS `product_id`,
	    `suba`.`product_order_type` AS `product_order_type`,
	    `suba`.`sort_no` AS `sort_no`,
            `subb`.`product_name` AS `product_name`,
            `subb`.`special_note` AS `special_note`,
            `subb`.`standard_price` AS `standard_price`,
            `subb`.`survey_price` AS `survey_price`,
            `subb`.`gurantee_price` AS `gurantee_price`,
            `subb`.`impjudge_gurantee_price` AS `impjudge_gurantee_price`,
            `subb`.`active_flg` AS `active_flg`,
            `subb`.`quantity_need_flg` AS `quantity_need_flg`,
            `subb`.`quantity_minimum` AS `quantity_minimum`,
            `subb`.`quantity_calc` AS `quantity_calc`,
            `subb`.`base_price` AS `base_price`,
            `subb`.`quantity_unit` AS `quantity_unit`,
            `subb`.`product_type_id` AS `product_type_id`,
            `subb`.`default_quantity` AS `default_quantity`,
            `subb`.`over_or_surpass` AS `over_or_surpass`,
            `subb`.`billing_product_name` AS `billing_product_name`,
            `subb`.`survey_product_id` AS `survey_product_id`,
            `subb`.`warranty_product_id` AS `warranty_product_id`,
            `subb`.`analysis_product_id` AS `analysis_product_id`,
            `subb`.`survey_method_id` AS `survey_method_id`,
            `subb`.`direct_foundation_warranty_flg` AS `direct_foundation_warranty_flg`,
            `subb`.`compaction_account_product_flg` AS `compaction_account_product_flg`
        FROM 
            `m_group_order_type` `main`
        JOIN 
            `m_product_order_type` `suba` 
            ON (`main`.`order_type_id` = `suba`.`order_type_id`)
        JOIN 
            `m_product` `subb` 
            ON (`suba`.`product_id` = `subb`.`product_id`)
    ) `main`
LEFT JOIN 
    `m_group_product` `sub` 
    ON (
        `main`.`group_id` = `sub`.`group_id` AND 
        `main`.`order_type_id` = `sub`.`order_type_id` AND 
        `main`.`product_id` = `sub`.`product_id`
    )
ORDER BY 
    `main`.`group_id`, 
    `main`.`order_type_id`, 
    `main`.`product_id`
